languages.text: "Продолжу поставлять мясо на арену. Без Злобы все человеческие пленники будут моей добычей, и я смогу порадовать наших любезных хозяев".
"I'll keep supplying meat for the arena. Without Malice around, all human captives will be mine to collect, and I'll have plenty of material to delight our gracious hosts with."
languages.original_text: "Продолжу поставлять мясо на арену. Без Злобы все человеческие пленники будут моей добычей, и я смогу порадовать наших любезных хозяев".

traits.locale_text: "I'll keep supplying meat for the arena. Without Malice around, all human captives will be mine to collect, and I'll have plenty of material to delight our gracious hosts with."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: “我打算继续为竞技场提供活畜。如今恶棍已经不在了，所有人类的俘虏都会成为我的手下，而我会得到大量的材料，取悦我们慷慨的主人们。”
languages.original_text: "I'll keep supplying meat for the arena. Without Malice around, all human captives will be mine to collect, and I'll have plenty of material to delight our gracious hosts with."

traits.locale_text: “我打算继续为竞技场提供活畜。如今恶棍已经不在了，所有人类的俘虏都会成为我的手下，而我会得到大量的材料，取悦我们慷慨的主人们。”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「アリーナのために肉を提供し続けますよ。マリスがいなければさらってきた人間はすべて私のものとなり、主催者を存分に喜ばすことができますからね」
languages.original_text: "I'll keep supplying meat for the arena. Without Malice around, all human captives will be mine to collect, and I'll have plenty of material to delight our gracious hosts with."

traits.locale_text: 「アリーナのために肉を提供し続けますよ。マリスがいなければさらってきた人間はすべて私のものとなり、主催者を存分に喜ばすことができますからね」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «Seguiré proporcionando carne a la arena. Sin Malicia de por medio, todos los cautivos humanos serán míos, por lo que tendré material de sobra con el que deleitar a nuestros nobles anfitriones».
languages.original_text: "I'll keep supplying meat for the arena. Without Malice around, all human captives will be mine to collect, and I'll have plenty of material to delight our gracious hosts with."

traits.locale_text: «Seguiré proporcionando carne a la arena. Sin Malicia de por medio, todos los cautivos humanos serán míos, por lo que tendré material de sobra con el que deleitar a nuestros nobles anfitriones».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: "I'll keep supplying meat for the arena. Without Malice around, all human captives will be mine to collect, and I'll have plenty of material to delight our gracious hosts with."

languages.text: « Je vais continuer à fournir l'arène en viande. Maintenant que Démon est hors jeu, je vais pouvoir récupérer tous les prisonniers humains et comme ça, j'aurai toujours de quoi divertir nos hôtes. »
languages.original_text: "I'll keep supplying meat for the arena. Without Malice around, all human captives will be mine to collect, and I'll have plenty of material to delight our gracious hosts with."

traits.locale_text: « Je vais continuer à fournir l'arène en viande. Maintenant que Démon est hors jeu, je vais pouvoir récupérer tous les prisonniers humains et comme ça, j'aurai toujours de quoi divertir nos hôtes. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Ich werde die Arena weiterhin mit Fleisch beliefern. Ohne Tücke kann ich alle gefangenen Menschen einsammeln und habe dann jede Menge Material, um unsere gnädigen Gastgeber zu entzücken."
languages.original_text: "I'll keep supplying meat for the arena. Without Malice around, all human captives will be mine to collect, and I'll have plenty of material to delight our gracious hosts with."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde die Arena weiterhin mit Fleisch beliefern. Ohne Tücke kann ich alle gefangenen Menschen einsammeln und habe dann jede Menge Material, um unsere gnädigen Gastgeber zu entzücken."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Arena için et tedarik etmeyi sürdüreceğim. Melanet olmayınca tüm insan tutsakları ben toplayacağım, cömert ev sahiplerimizi hoşnut edecek bol malzemem de var."
languages.original_text: "I'll keep supplying meat for the arena. Without Malice around, all human captives will be mine to collect, and I'll have plenty of material to delight our gracious hosts with."

traits.locale_text: "Arena için et tedarik etmeyi sürdüreceğim. Melanet olmayınca tüm insan tutsakları ben toplayacağım ve cömert ev sahiplerimizi hoşnut edecek bol bol da malzemem var."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
